title: Nihiwatu
creator_credit: Christiana Stergiou, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: On the remote Indonesian island of Sumba is the village of Nihiwatu, a place that can only be found in the Ethical Travel Guide. It was here that Christiana Stergiou discovered her utopia, and a place that, despite being a seasoned traveller, she will never forget.
creator_credit_for_label: Christiana Stergiou, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
